Origin UI Toolkit

The Origin UI Toolkit is the language between design and development. It is the building blocks that are used to create our components, and ultimately, create our rich web application. You can download the Origin UI Toolkit below, or by using Bower.

Download Otk

Once you have downloaded the Origin UI Toolkit, place it in your source tree (as well as a link to Google's Open Sans) and then browse this documentation to see how to use the elements in the toolkit.

    
<!-- Google Open Sans -->
<link href='//fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:400,300,600' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'>

<!-- OTK min css and js -->
<link href='otk.min.css' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'>
